amendatorysection.para: Nothing in sections 14-384 to 14-3,127 shall be construed as in any way abridging, modifying, or limiting the authority or right heretofore granted to and now possessed by any metropolitan city under general law to improve any road, highway, or boulevard leading into such city for a distance not to exceed six miles from the corporate limits thereof, nor as modifying the procedure under such grant or the power or authority to issue bonds in connection therewith, but such authority is hereby expressly recognized and the power so granted by general law shall not be subject to any of the limitations contained in sections 14-384 to 14-3,127.
